Example

Write down the solutions for \(X\), for \(Y\) and hence the product solution \(u(x,y)=X(x)Y(y)\):

Solution

\(X=A\cos \lambda x +B\sin \lambda x\) \(Y=Ce^{\lambda y}+D e^{-\lambda y}\)
so
\(\qquad u=(A\cos \lambda x +B\sin \lambda x)(Ce^{\lambda y}+D e^{-\lambda y})\) \[(4)\]
